snippet: On paper, the overhauled Chevrolet Malibu lineup looks strong, and the first model to arrive is the Eco. But the car, a mild hybrid, doesn’t make a very strong case for its particular approach to efficiency.
abstract: Behind the Wheel column review of the 2013 Chevrolet Malibu Eco hybrid.
lead_paragraph: On paper, the overhauled Chevrolet Malibu lineup looks strong, and the first model to arrive is the Eco. But the car, a mild hybrid, doesn’t make a very strong case for its particular approach to efficiency.

headline.seo: The Battery Is Included, but the Benefit Is Slim
